1: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> מֹשֶׁה֙ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>And Moses</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> רָאשֵׁ֣י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>unto the heads</n> הַמַּטּ֔וֹת <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribes</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>concerning the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> זֶ֣ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> הַדָּבָ֔ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>This [is] the thing</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוָּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>hath commanded</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n>
2: אִישׁ֩ <sup>376 </sup> <n>If a man</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִדֹּ֨ר <sup>5087 </sup> <n>vow</n> נֶ֜דֶר <sup>5088 </sup> <n>a vow</n> לַֽיהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֽוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> הִשָּׁ֤בַע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>or swear</n> שְׁבֻעָה֙ <sup>7621 </sup> <n>an oath</n> לֶאְסֹ֤ר <sup>631 </sup> <n>to bind</n> אִסָּר֙ <sup>632 </sup> <n>with a bond</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יַחֵ֖ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>he shall not break</n> דְּבָר֑וֹ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his word</n> כְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> הַיֹּצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>according to all that proceedeth</n> מִפִּ֖יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>out of his mouth</n> יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he shall do</n>
3: וְאִשָּׁ֕ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>If a woman</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> תִדֹּ֥ר <sup>5087 </sup> <n>also vow</n> נֶ֖דֶר <sup>5088 </sup> <n>a vow</n> לַיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> וְאָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>and bind</n> אִסָּ֛ר <sup>632 </sup> <n>herself by a bond</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִ֖יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>[being] in her father's</n> בִּנְעֻרֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5271 </sup> <n>in her youth</n>
4: וְשָׁמַ֨ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> אָבִ֜יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>And her father</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נִדְרָ֗הּ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>her vow</n> וֶֽאֱסָרָהּ֙ <sup>632 </sup> <n>and her bond</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָֽסְרָ֣ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she hath bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשָׁ֔הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> וְהֶחֱרִ֥ישׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>shall hold his peace</n> לָ֖הּ אָבִ֑יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>and her father</n> וְקָ֙מוּ֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>at her then all her vows</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> אִסָּ֛ר <sup>632 </sup> <n>and every bond</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she hath bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> יָקֽוּם׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n>
5: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הֵנִ֨יא <sup>5106 </sup> <n>disallow</n> אָבִ֣יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>But if her father</n> אֹתָהּ֮ <sup>853 </sup> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>her in the day</n> שָׁמְעוֹ֒ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that he heareth</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> נְדָרֶ֗יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>not any of her vows</n> וֶֽאֱסָרֶ֛יהָ <sup>632 </sup> <n>or of her bonds</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she hath bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָק֑וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> וַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> יִֽסְלַח־ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>shall forgive</n> לָ֔הּ כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>her because</n> הֵנִ֥יא <sup>5106 </sup> <n>disallowed</n> אָבִ֖יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>her because her father</n> אֹתָֽהּ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
6: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הָי֤וֹ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> תִֽהְיֶה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And if she had at all an husband</n> וּנְדָרֶ֖יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>when she vowed</n> עָלֶ֑יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>under</n> א֚וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> מִבְטָ֣א <sup>4008 </sup> <n>or uttered</n> שְׂפָתֶ֔יהָ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>ought out of her lips</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֖ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>under</n> נַפְשָֽׁהּ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n>
7: וְשָׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> אִישָׁ֛הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And her husband</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>at her in the day</n> שָׁמְע֖וֹ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that he heard</n> וְהֶחֱרִ֣ישׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>[it] and held his peace</n> לָ֑הּ וְקָ֣מוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> נְדָרֶ֗יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>[it] then her vows</n> וֶֽאֱסָרֶ֛הָ <sup>632 </sup> <n>and her bonds</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> יָקֻֽמוּ׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n>
8: וְ֠אִם <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בְּי֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>her on the day</n> שְׁמֹ֣עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that he heard</n> אִישָׁהּ֮ <sup>376 </sup> <n>But if her husband</n> יָנִ֣יא <sup>5106 </sup> <n>disallowed</n> אוֹתָהּ֒ <sup>853 </sup> וְהֵפֵ֗ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>of none effect</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נִדְרָהּ֙ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>[it] then he shall make her vow which she vowed</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָלֶ֔יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is under</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>853 </sup> מִבְטָ֣א <sup>4008 </sup> <n>and that which she uttered</n> שְׂפָתֶ֔יהָ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>with her lips</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֖ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is under</n> נַפְשָׁ֑הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> וַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> יִֽסְלַֽח־ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>shall forgive</n> לָֽהּ׃
9: וְנֵ֥דֶר <sup>5088 </sup> <n>But every vow</n> אַלְמָנָ֖ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>of a widow</n> וּגְרוּשָׁ֑ה <sup>1644 </sup> <n>and of her that is divorced</n> כֹּ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everything</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith they have bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>their souls</n> יָק֥וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
10: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אִישָׁ֖הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>in her husband's</n> נָדָ֑רָה <sup>5087 </sup> <n>And if she vowed</n> אֽוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>or bound</n> אִסָּ֛ר <sup>632 </sup> <n>by a bond</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> בִּשְׁבֻעָֽה׃ <sup>7621 </sup> <n>with an oath</n>
11: וְשָׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> אִישָׁהּ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And her husband</n> וְהֶחֱרִ֣שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>[it] and held his peace</n> לָ֔הּ לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הֵנִ֖יא <sup>5106 </sup> <n>at her [and] disallowed</n> אֹתָ֑הּ <sup>853 </sup> וְקָ֙מוּ֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>her not then all her vows</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> אִסָּ֛ר <sup>632 </sup> <n>and every bond</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָסְרָ֥ה <sup>631 </sup> <n>wherewith she bound</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>her soul</n> יָקֽוּם׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall stand</n>
12: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הָפֵר֩ <sup>6565 </sup> <n>hath utterly</n> יָפֵ֨ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>made them void</n> אֹתָ֥ם ׀ <sup>853 </sup> אִישָׁהּ֮ <sup>376 </sup> <n>But if her husband</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>on the day</n> שָׁמְעוֹ֒ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>he heard</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whatever</n> מוֹצָ֨א <sup>4161 </sup> <n>[them then] whatsoever proceeded</n> שְׂפָתֶ֧יהָ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>out of her lips</n> לִנְדָרֶ֛יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>concerning her vows</n> וּלְאִסַּ֥ר <sup>632 </sup> <n>or concerning the bond</n> נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of her soul</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יָק֑וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall not stand</n> אִישָׁ֣הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>her husband</n> הֲפֵרָ֔ם <sup>6565 </sup> <n>hath made them void</n> וַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> יִֽסְלַֽח־ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>shall forgive</n> לָֽהּ׃
13: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Every</n> נֵ֛דֶר <sup>5088 </sup> <n>Every vow</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> שְׁבֻעַ֥ת <sup>7621 </sup> <n>oath</n> אִסָּ֖ר <sup>632 </sup> <n>and every binding</n> לְעַנֹּ֣ת <sup>6031 </sup> <n>to afflict</n> נָ֑פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the soul</n> אִישָׁ֥הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>her husband</n> יְקִימֶ֖נּוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>may establish</n> וְאִישָׁ֥הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>it or her husband</n> יְפֵרֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>6565 </sup> <n>may make it void</n>
14: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הַחֲרֵשׁ֩ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>altogether</n> יַחֲרִ֨ישׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>hold his peace</n> לָ֥הּ אִישָׁהּ֮ <sup>376 </sup> <n>But if her husband</n> מִיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>at her from day</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יוֹם֒ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>to day</n> וְהֵקִים֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>then he establisheth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>all her vows</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֱסָרֶ֖יהָ <sup>632 </sup> <n>or all her bonds</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָלֶ֑יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>her he</n> הֵקִ֣ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>which [are] upon her he confirmeth</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> הֶחֱרִ֥שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>them because he held his peace</n> לָ֖הּ בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>at her in the day</n> שָׁמְעֽוֹ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that he heard</n>
15: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הָפֵ֥ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>But if he shall any ways</n> יָפֵ֛ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>make them void</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> שָׁמְע֑וֹ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that he hath heard</n> וְנָשָׂ֖א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[them] then he shall bear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹנָֽהּ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>her iniquity</n>
16: אֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> הַֽחֻקִּ֗ים <sup>2706 </sup> <n>These [are] the statutes</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוָּ֤ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>between a man</n> לְאִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>and his wife</n> בֵּֽין־ <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> אָ֣ב <sup>1 </sup> <n>between the father</n> לְבִתּ֔וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and his daughter</n> בִּנְעֻרֶ֖יהָ <sup>5271 </sup> <n>[being yet] in her youth</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִֽיהָ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>in her father's</n> פ
